citations.narrative:
Four rabbits are housed in enclosures that provide enough floor space but are only 11 " high . Rabbits require an
enclosure that is 14 " high . This height ensures that rabbits may be allowed normal postural adjustment. Enclosures that
are at least 14 " high must be provided to these rabbits . CORRECT BY : 7/19/21
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the owner.
End Section

narrative:
3.53(c) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Four rabbits are housed in enclosures that provide enough floor space but are only 11 " high . Rabbits require an 
enclosure that is 14 " high . This height ensures that rabbits may be allowed normal postural adjustment. Enclosures that 
are at least 14 " high must be provided to these rabbits . CORRECT BY : 7/19/21 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the owner. 
 
End Section
